name: ˹ᴛᴜɴᴇ ᴠɪᴀ ʙᴏᴛ˼
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

API_ID.description: Telegram API ID, available at https://my.telegram.org. Required to connect the bot to Telegram servers.

API_HASH.description: Telegram API Hash, available at https://my.telegram.org. Required alongside API ID.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot Token from BotFather after creating your Telegram bot.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: MongoDB database connection URI, used for storing user and bot-related data. Get it from https://cloud.mongodb.com.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram numeric user ID (use @userinfobot to find it). Multiple IDs can be separated by a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram v2 session string. Generate it securely from https://telegram.tools/session-string-generator#pyrogram.

LOGGER_ID.description: Chat ID of your log group where the bot sends important logs. Make sure the bot is admin in that group.

COOKIE_URL.description: Direct raw link (from Batbin or Pastebin) to your YouTube cookies.txt file for better download support.

API_URL.description: (Optional) URL of a custom API server used for music downloads or other services.

API_KEY.description: (Optional) API Key associated with your custom music download server (used with API_URL).

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku account API key, required if you want the bot to support auto-updates or dynamic deployments.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of your Heroku app. Required if using HEROKU_API_KEY for deployments.
